conbody.p: Each document in Serna belongs to some document type that is associated with a particular set of metadata (e.g. , , ). This association can be done by means of Serna document templates. Thanks to it, you do not have to specify the paths to relevant metadata manually when creating or opening a document in Serna.

Serna supports complex industrial DTDs/Schemas. For the user's convenience, document types are grouped into the following document categories:
DITA 1.0
DITA 1.1
Docbook Lite
Docbook 0.5
Docbook 4.2
Docbook 4.3
Docbook 4.4
Docbook 4.5
IDEAliance
NITF
TEI P4
XHTML
XML Resume
Syntext

For example, the DITA 1.1 category includes the following document types:
Topic
Task
Concept
Reference
Glossary
Composite
Map
Bookmap
Serna comes with ready-made document templates for these supported document types.
Serna also comes with a ready-made Default document template to work with well-formed documents.
